name: Thousand-Tailed Watcher
rules_text:
Accelerate (You may pay 1 as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
When you play me, give enemy units -3 this turn, to a minimum of 1.

params.summary: When played, give enemy units -3 might this turn, to a minimum of 1.

flavor: You will know when you've pushed the wilds too far.
